ai.summary: A short, easy 1.9 km walk in the UK suitable for beginners and families. The route features gentle terrain and a relaxed pace, making it an accessible introduction to outdoor walking.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently undulating paths with smooth surfaces; occasional gravel or compact dirt sections; some shaded stretches.
ai.safety_notes: Generally suitable for most ages and fitness levels. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Check the forecast and daylight hours before you go. Stay on marked paths and carry a map or GPS. Be mindful of other walkers and leave no trace. In an emergency, call your local emergency number (UK: 999).
recommended_gear: Light layers and a waterproof jacket
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; winter visits are possible with proper clothing and shorter daylight hours.

seo.title: Impey Walk – Easy 1.9 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Impey Walk is an easy 1.9 km hike in the UK, ideal for beginners and families. Enjoy gentle terrain, a short route, and accessible scenery.
